definition: formally reject or disavow a formerly held belief, usually under pressure
details:
verb
- formally reject or disavow a formerly held belief, usually under pressure
= example: formally reject or disavow a formerly held belief, usually under pressure
= synonyms: resile
- pull inward or towards a center
= synonyms: draw in
- use a surgical instrument to hold open (the edges of a wound or an organ)
= synonyms: pull back, draw back
- pull away from a source of disgust or fear
= synonyms: shrink back
